content.introduction:
Finds uses of 
#if
 that can be simplified to 
#ifdef
 or 
#ifndef
 and,
since C23 and C++23, uses of 
#elif
 that can be simplified to 
#elifdef

or 
#elifndef
:

#if defined(MEOW)


#if !defined(MEOW)



// becomes



#ifdef MEOW


#ifndef MEOW

Since C23 and C++23:

#elif defined(MEOW)


#elif !defined(MEOW)



// becomes



#elifdef MEOW


#elifndef MEOW
